Description: You will be responsible to assist with the efficient running of the department in line with Hyatt International's Corporate Strategies and brand standards, whilst meeting employee, guest and owner expectations.   The Team Leader - Security is responsible to assist in the smooth operations of the security operations. Ideally with a professional diploma or certificate in Safety and Security. Minimum 2 years work experience as Assistant Security Manager, or Senior Security Officer in larger operation. Good practical, operational and adequate administrative skills are an asset.Job Details
